summary: Provides augmentation to Destruction spells based on Destruction level, character level, and optionally spell usage.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=6]Version[/size][/color]
v1.1 Initial public release

[color=#ff0000][size=6]What it does[/size][/color]
Provides augmentation to Destruction spells based on Destruction level, character level, and optionally spell usage.

Leveling Destruction Magick (LDM) monitors the player character and updates the magnitude (effect strength) of Destruction spells as the character gains levels. In addition it records each time a Destruction spell causes damage and adds experience associated with that specific spell. As you gain more experience with spells, they become even more powerful to approximate spell specialization.

[color=#ff0000][size=6]Installation[/size][/color]
Use NMM to install or unzip the files and drop into your Data folder.


[color=#ff0000][size=6]Uninstallation[/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00][b]Before removing the mod; disable it via the MCM. Otherwise your character will appear to have no Destruction spells.[/b][/color]
author: TaikoDragon
